constituent: spinal column, I Ching, Master Po, umbrella, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisigStory: The spinal column has sprouted out of the flesh of your back into an umbrella that you always have with you, rain or shine. The pair of 2s on each side are the "ribs" of the umbrella. Take care to keep your image of the key word distinct from that for spine (Frame 24).
koohiiStory1: Look, says the teacher in biology class. "The spinal column holds your flesh together, just like the metal rod of this umbrella (he demonstrates this with an umbrella covered in I-Ching symbols) holds the umbrella together".
koohiiStory2: A pictograph of a spinal column. The umbrella representing the shoulder blades, the I Ching as the shoulder muscles and the part of the body as the spine itself.
myStory: cột sống. bộ phận cơ thể có 4 xương gắn xung quanh của con người
